ygData.subject: Re: Lvl 16 spell question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Bladd, Banshee Aura is an incredible spell.  I cast it before initiating melee and after the mob frenzies on me, which it always does after stacking dots,
ygData.messageBody:
Dear Bladd,

Banshee Aura is an incredible spell. I cast it before initiating melee and
after the mob frenzies on me, which it always does after stacking dots, and
it does 8 pts of damage each time it hits. It always helps me finish off
the yellows that I solo. The pearl is a one time purchase and well worth
it. I don't know where it is available, a guild member found one on a
vendor at Lake Rathe i believe and got it for me. Good luck.

Grymspine Mael'fesience
Level 20 Necromancer
Mithaniel Marr
